At least, until you hear the sound of a polite, but deliberate, cough. \n\nThe two of you cease your tomfoolery to find the head librarian staring at the two of you. \n\n//"Books get me just as excited as the next girl, but this is a place for studying, not hookups. There's literally a park right outside, have all the fun you want out there,"// she says before walking off back to her desk. \n\nThe two of you giggle at your minor indiscretion before heading towards the library exit. Before you step out the door though, you feel your phone vibrate. You look down to see a message from <<if $related == true>>your parents<<else>>the Maywoods<</if>>. It looks like their movie is over and they want you to come back and help them move stuff into Brittany's apartment. \n\nYou could call your little date short, or you could keep it going without consideration for what <<if $related == true>>your parents<<else>>the Maywoods<</if>> want. After all, you're a man -- no, a god -- now.\n\n<<statup>>\s\n[[Head to Brittany's apartment. |BrittanyTravelApartment1][$monica_love -= 1; $monica_sub -= 1; $monica_lust -= 1; $time += 1; $monica_girlfriend to true]]\n[[Walk Monica back to the dorm. |MonicaDormWalkTravel1][$monica_love += 1; $monica_sub += 1; $monica_lust += 1; $mm_love -= 3; $mm_sub -= 3; $mm_lust -= 3; $britt_love -= 3; $britt_sub -= 3; $britt_lust -= 3; $dd_love -= 3; $dd_sub -= 3; $dd_lust -= 3; $time += 1; $monica_girlfriend to true]]

You can't interact with anything yet, so the best you can do is follow him as he walks down the hall. \n\n//"That's it, prove to me you're better than your father ever was,"// the vision whispers. \n\nEven in the dream, Jake's hands are shaking as they go up to touch his mother's face. As he leans forward to give her a kiss though, he hears the door open again. He turns back around, expecting to see his mother, but instead it's the same man that you've seen countless times before. \n\n//"Oh good, you came back. I was so worried you'd left for good this ti --"//\n\nJake turns back around to see the doppleganger has vanished. You watch as the cycle begins anew with yet another vision of his mother being penetrated by yet another vision of his father. \n\nYou can feel the tension rising as the room starts to shake. It would seem that Jake's doing everything he can to break out of this nightmare, forcing you to retreat from his subconsciousness as well. You wonder if this is a recurring nightmare for Jake or if your presence had some sort of an effect on it. \n\nEither way, you eventually pull out and find yourself back in your own body, back in your dorm. Jake snaps awake at his desk and wipes the sweat from his brow. He looks over at you to see if you noticed him do anything unusual while he was asleep, but you feign ignorance. \n\nSeeing how late it is, the two of you decide to go to sleep for the night. After all, you'll need to get a good night's rest if you want to be up and ready for your classes tomorrow.\n\n[[Continue |TravelDream1]]
<div class='img-container1'><img src= "images\s009\shill_naked.jpg" /><img src= "images\saug02\sfiller.png" /><img src= "images\saug02\sfiller.png" /><img src= "images\saug02\sfiller.png" /><img src= "images\saug02\sfiller.png" /></div>\s\n\nYou watch this cycle repeat several times, all the while Jake stands next to you with his fists clenched. Are you in Jake's dream... or his nightmare? \n\nEventually the scene shifts, though you remain in the mobile home. Jake's mom is making breakfast and trying to have a conversation with him about his day, but he doesn't respond. Instead, he just keeps looking back at the bed, where a naked doppleganger of his mom sits, enticing him to come and join her. \n\n//"Come on, be a man,"// the doppleganger whispers. //"You don't want him to come back and take me, do you?"// it asks. \n\n//"Jake, did you hear me?"// his mother asks. \n\nJake tries to turn to her, but he's so distracted by the naked woman on the bed that he's unable to respond. \n\n//"Just, don't stay up playing games all night, okay? I'm going to have work another late shift tonight,"// his mom says before giving him a kiss on the forehead. //"I love you,"// she says as she walks out the door. \n\n//"I love you too,"// the doppleganger teases from the bedroom. \n\n[[Continue |JakeTravelOrangeLight5]]

This is, after all, just a dream. Ms. Hill stays behind though, alone in the trailer park, rubbing her stomach. I was so worried you'd left for good this ti --"// Ms. Hill's words are interrupted by the man's tongue as he grabs her in his arms and starts passionately making out with her. \n\nWhen he breaks the kiss, Ms. Hill takes the opportunity to start speaking again, but he doesn't care. <div class='img-container1'><img src= "images\s009\shill_doggy.jpg" /><img src= "images\s009\shill_side.jpg" /><img src= "images\saug02\sfiller.png" /><img src= "images\saug02\sfiller.png" /><img src= "images\saug02\sfiller.png" /></div>\s\n\nAlmost as if taking pity on your incorporeal form, Jake stands up and opens the door of the mobile home, allowing the both of you to take a peek inside. \n\nTo your surprise, you find Ms. Hill laying on a bed, getting pounded from behind by an unknown man. <div class='img-container1'><img src= "images\saug02\sjake_vanilla.jpg" /><img src= "images\s009\sjake_woods.jpg" /><img src= "images\saug02\sfiller.png" /><img src= "images\saug02\sfiller.png" /><img src= "images\saug02\sfiller.png" /></div>\s\n<<if $see_orange_intro == true>>\s\n\nYou draw in the humming orange light and draw in its power. Where the hell are you?\n\nNot too far away, you can see lights, so you decide to walk towards them. After exiting the clearing, you find yourself staring at a mobile home. You can see two silhouettes inside. At first, you think they're arguing, but it quickly becomes clear what's actually going on. Outside the home, sitting on the steps, Jake. \n\nIf anyone should know what's going on in this dream world, it's him. When you try to approach him though, he doesn't react at all. It's as if you're not there. You try to touch the door handle, but your hand slips right through it. There might be a way to interact with dreams in the future, but for now you lack the necessary power. \n\n<<statup>>\s\n[[Continue |JakeTravelOrangeLight2][$see_orange_intro to false]]\n

<div class='img-container1'><img src= "images\saug02\smm_closeup_replacement.jpg" /><img src= "images\saug02\sfiller.png" /><img src= "images\saug02\sfiller.png" /></div>\s\n\n<<if $related == true>>Your father<<else>>Mr. Maywood<</if>> sighs in frustration before finally relenting. //"I'm sorry, honey.
